item.description:
There is a getsugar deal for 50% off 8 sessions of Boot Camp (must purchase through this link to get the discount):

http://getsugarrush.g...

Nikki and Alicia at A Healthy Balance are back with another great boot camp offer for people living or working near Quincy and the South Shore. Score 8 boot camp sessions for half price. You pay $55 through getsugar and save 50% on the regular price of $110.

Nikki Tierney and Alicia Golden are personal trainers at A Healthy Balance, and run their boot camps in Quincy at Pageant Field on Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday evenings from 6-7pm.

Choose one of three tracks: (1) August 8 through September 2 (2) August 22 through September 16 or (3) September 7 through September 30.

Boot Camps are at Pageant Field in Quincy. The address for directions is: 1 Merrymount Parkway, Quincy, MA 02169



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DETAILS, RESTRICTION AND TERMS
E-certificate for service sent by email from getsugar.

E-certificate must be redeemed by September 7, 2010 and all sessions must be completed by September 30, 2010. There are 12 sessions in each track, except Track 2 which has 11 sessions as there is no session on Sunday, September 5, 2010. 8 sessions may be redeemed as wished within the track purchased. No refunds will be given for uncompleted sessions. Limit one redemption per person. Offer cannot be combined with any other offer, special, discount, coupon or promotion. Cannot be applied to past purchases. Face value of e-certificate is the price paid.

Redeem at:
6-7 pm Sunday, Tuesday, Thursdays
Pageant Field
1 Merrymount Parkway
Quincy, MA 02169
617 479 0500 | www.ahealthybalancenutrition.com

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Healthy Balance Boot Camp
